Public Member Functions

 PaintDc (DeviceContext *dc)
virtual ~PaintDc ()
 Invokes an EndUpdate.

Detailed Description

Allows a comfortable usage for working on a Device-Context while not changing the default Device-Context. The constructor invokes a BeginUpdate and the destructor invokes an EndUpdate.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PaintDc::PaintDc (  DeviceContext *  dc  ) 
 

The paint Device-Context is initialized with the same parameters as given by the default Device-Context and a BeginUpdate is done.

Parameters:
dc Pointer to the default Device-Context.

PaintDc::~PaintDc (   )  [virtual]
 

Invokes an EndUpdate.
